items.title: IPCC Statement on the US announcement to withdraw from participation in IPCC
items.description: GENEVA, Jan 8 – The Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) has taken note of the US government’s announcement about its withdrawal from more than 60 UN and non-UN organisations, including the IPCC.
